io.micronaut.http.sse

Interface Event<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The event type

    public interface Event<T>
    Represents a Server Sent Event. See https://www.w3.org/TR/2011/WD-eventsource-20111020/.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher

    • Field Summary

      The data parameter.

      The id parameter.

      The retry parameter.
